cleaned_text: 1 Contact Us Uganda National Bureau Of Standards, Headquarters, Standards House, Plot 2 -12 By-Pass Link, Bweyogerere Industrial And Business 6329 Kampala , Tel: 0417333250 Standards Development Work Programme Bulletin July - December 2023 UNBS Standards Work Programme Bulletin, Vol - 01- No 1 .July - December 2023 2 Contact Us Uganda National Bureau Of Standards, Headquarters, Standards House, Plot 2 -12 By-Pass Link, Bweyogerere Industrial And Business 6329 Kampala , Tel: 0417333250 INTRODUCTION The Uganda National Bureau of Standards (UNBS) is a statutory body under the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Co -operatives established by the UNBS Act Cap 327 and became operational in 1989. It is governed by the National Standards Council and headed by the Ex ecutive Director who is responsible for the day -to-day operation of UNBS. Standards development work is carried out by Technical Committees in the standards development department. The committees work to develop standards with regional and international standards bodies in developing standards. The approval of requests for standards development is done by the Standards Management Committee (SMC) . During the development of Uganda Standards, draft standards are circulated for discussion within the technica l committees or sub -committees. These draft standards pass through a number of stages before being presented to NSC for approval as Uganda Standards. A recent catalogue of Uganda Standards can be accessed on the link below: https://unbs.go.ug//attachments/menus/27/Uganda%20Standards%20Catalogue%20as%20of%2028%20Feb %202022.pdf Following the approval of request s for standards development by the Standards Management Committee (SMC) , a standards work program is developed. This Standards Work Programme contains a list of all the proposed standards projects for development as approved by the SMC for the period July to December 2023. Notification of the standards work programme is one of the procedures followed during standards development. 3 Contact Us Uganda National Bureau Of Standards, Headquarters, Standards House, Plot 2 -12 By-Pass Link, Bweyogerere Industrial And Business - Uganda National Bureau of Standards 2.
